name: Kate
description: In2076, Kate, alongside Douglas, investigate the activities of an unknown netrunner targeting Arasaka operatives who attempted to reconstruct the lateTanaka's data. Seeking to turn a fixer to Arasaka's payroll, Kate arranged forFaradayto be ambushed by gangbangers. Predictably, he would feel undervalued by Militech and thus turn collar to Arasaka. name: Gloria Martinez
description: While working as en EMT,David Martinezwas born to Gloria in the back of an ambulance while it was speeding through the streets ofNight City. While re-attaching the arm of an edgerunner who had gotten it shot off, Gloria felt her water break, so she quickly finished the sutures before telling themercenaryto swap seats with her, then proceeded to deliver her own baby on the gurney, with the ambulance still speeding towards a hospital. The merc alongside her cut the umbilical cord using themanti...

name: James Norris
description: James Norris was a former lieutenant colonel of theNUSA military, who wentcyberpsychoinNight City. Arriving atCity Center, Norris walked to the campus of theMilitech OfficesinCorporate Plazaand attacked multipleNCPDofficers utilizing his cyberware and weaponry.His rampage resulted in the deaths of 27 officers.WhenMaxTacarrived on the scene, Norris was quickly paralyzed with a quickhack and then neutralized by being shot in the head with aM-179 Achilles.

name: Delamain (AI)
description: Delamain was a non-sentient AI created by the company Alte Weltordnung. His core was purchased byDelamain CorporationofNight Cityto drive its fleet of taxicabs in response to a dramatic increase in accidents caused by human drivers and the financial losses from the resulting lawsuits. The AI quickly returned Delamain Corp to profitability and assumed other responsibilities, such as replacing the company's human mechanics with automated repair drones and transforming the business into the city...

name: Julio
description: David Martinezand his crew were given a job from Night City-based fixerWakako Okada, in which they had to rescue hostages from theMaelstromganglocated at theTotentanz. At the request of Wakako, David brought along a new recruit named Julio. David provided Julio with asuperior weaponto the one he had. David also told Julio not to rush things, alongside telling him to be behind David at all times, as he's new to the crew. Ignoring David's advice, Julio get's himself killed by running into an ex...

name: Papa Sunrise
description: At some point, Sunrise and his wife had a son they calledPilar. Sunrise inspired and trained his son to follow the merc path. However, the family didn't have an easy life, and it pained Papa Sunrise to see his son struggling. ThenRebeccawas born, though six years later Sunrise's wife vanished. Any time Becca asked him about her, Papa Sunrise told her daughter off, as he didn't want to talk about her mom, and occasionally admonished her due to Rebecca's behavior, which reminded him of his wife...
